fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Healthy: When you have 5 HP, you have +2 hand space. 
- Natural Pairings: Learn how many pairs of true non-Orders there are on the playerlist. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Healing: Play a Reforged Heal! on someone. [3 uses, 2 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Cleansing: Play a Reforged Cleanse! on someone. [2 uses, 2 CD, Unlocks D2]
- Revitalize: Choose a player. If they die from non-event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3, Locks D5]
